1381220.name: Astro Dash Soundtrack
1381220.description:
listen to 16 tracks from the outer spiral arm of the Pernaculan Nebular

1.Great Balls of Glarp
2.Stairway to Gleeban 5
3.A Song for Hagnorg
4.My Flognog Sounds Better With You
5.I Wouldn't Take Her to a garcknar Fight
6.I Don't Know Whether to Kill han goran or Go Bowling
7.Narnaval Broke My Heart at Citi alpha 6
8.Why Does It Hurt When I Plargree
9.I Promise Not To qourglat In Your Mouth
10.Now I Wanna Sniff Some rorasork
11.I wanna find a zafnarpol that will hold my varnwalo
12.when i narf at you qwoft you didn't mind
13.A tentacle full of zeponbrul
14.16 branglofs and im still good to fly
15.i left her on the 7 moon of grendoff yet i can still hear her complain
16.I blorked when i saw her face
